fields.name: But I liked my Neutral Evil witch:
Abilities:
fields.value: - Control someone into a player of your choice each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know the role of the player you control.
- You are immune to roleblocks and taunts.
- With the Necronomicon, your target is also dealt a Basic Attack.
- You cannot control the same person twice in a row.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.
